parameters.home_team: The home team participant in the match to be scheduled
parameters.away_team: The away team participant in the match to be scheduled
parameters.year: The year the scheduled match is to take place
parameters.month: The month the scheduled match is to take place
parameters.day: The day of month the scheduled match is to take place
parameters.hour: The hour of the day the match is to take place
parameters.minute: The minute of the hour the match is to take place
parameters.timezone: The timezone identifier used to localize the provided date/time info

field_format.value: You have successfully scheduled a match

footer_format.text: Please check #bot-logs for the official confirmation or use `/showmatches` to set the updated match calendar

direct_response_not_ok.title: Match unabled to be scheduled
direct_response_not_ok.description: There was a problem scheduling the match

footer_format.text: If you continue to experience issues scheduling a match, please alert staff

parameters.home: The home team participant in the match to cancel
parameters.away: The away team participant in the match to cancel

field_format.value: The match between {} and {} has been cancelled

footer_format.text: Please check #bot-logs for the official confirmation or use `/showmatches` to set the updated match calendar

direct_response_not_ok.title: Match unabled to be cancelled
direct_response_not_ok.description: There was a problem cancelling the match

field_format.value: Error: It is likely the match you are attempting to cancel (__{}__ vs. __{}__) does not exist

footer_format.text: If you continue to experience issues cancelling a match, please alert staff

direct_response_ok.title: Scheduled matches
direct_response_ok.description: Here's a schedule of upcoming matches
